data.name: Turnament
data.detailed_description:
You're Commander Neek's space mining apprentice and he does not like you. Thankfully, Space Director Adalina keeps him in check every now and then.

Collect minerals to gain energy, use that energy to turn squares on the grid, destroy enemy drones and try to keep Commander Neek alive.

  • Real-Time-Strategy missions on a 2D grid
  • 2-hour-long single-player campaign
  • Endless Mode (with seed numbers)
  • Challenge Mode (planned)
  • Level Editor (planned)
  • Chill soundtrack by Muddasheep (safe to stream)
  • Character art by Robert Guillaume
